name: The Heart of the Matter
description:
The task is simple: find the scattered pieces of the robot's heart and repair it. Don't die. Good luck.

Hint: Use the alcoves to hide from the Antibody

Controls

WASD = Movement

Mouse = camera

E = Pick up and place object

ESC = Main Menu

Created for the global game jam 2020.
